scripts.build: webpack build --mode production && tailwindcss --input static/css/main.css --output static/main.build.css --minify
scripts.start-test: RUST_LOG_STYLE=always watchexec --debounce 2 --watch ./Cargo.toml --watch ./src --watch ./static --watch ./benches --restart cargo test --color always --features kube
scripts.start-server-docs: concurrently 'watchexec --debounce 2 --watch ./Cargo.toml --watch ./src cargo doc --color always --lib --features kube' 'browser-sync start --server ./target/doc --startPath magicentry --reload-delay 5000 --watch'
